functions.name: get_other_material_price_conversion_factor
functions.description: Get the conversion factor for converting Other Material prices from source year to reference year dollars
functions.body: get(chemical_price_index, ref_year) / get( chemical_price_index, get( get(non_energy_material_prices, 'Source Data Year'), get(other_material, 'name') ) )

functions.name: get_other_material_price_for_year
functions.description: Calculate the price of a given Other Material for a year (although year is not used in this function)
functions.body: INFLATION_FACTOR * get(other_material, 'usage') * ( get( get(non_energy_material_prices, 'Price'), get(other_material, 'name'), ) * get_other_material_price_conversion_factor(other_material, ref_year) )

functions.name: prices_for_other_material
functions.description: Get prices for a given Other Material over a range of years

functions.name: get_other_material_price_df
functions.description: Get a dataframe of Other Material prices over a range of years
